display_long_description:
Dive into the pirate world of the early 18th century. Become a respected captain and take command of Nassau — the historic city that once served as the capital of the pirate brotherhood.

Sail the seas, engage in naval battles, recruit legendary captains, dive for treasure, expand your city, and manage resources.

The Pirate Republic of Nassau is an open-world pirate game that gives players the freedom to shape their own destiny. Plunder merchant ships or become a trader yourself. Take on missions from governors, and follow tavern rumors to unlock hidden quests and new locations.

Enjoy stunning visuals powered by the capabilities of modern standalone VR headsets.

Key Features:
● Build Nassau — the free capital of the Pirate Republic.
● Harness a deep economic system to profit from trade and produce your own goods.
● Recruit historical captains and command their unique ships.
● Upgrade and customize your fleet.
● Master tactical combat — outsmart your enemies, use the right ammunition, and set deadly traps.
● Discover ports and secret locations by sailing the open sea or listening to tavern rumors.
● Dive for gold and rare pearls.
● Explore secret caves full of treasures.
● Sail solo, compete in PvP, or play with friends in Co-Op.
